anns.prefix: Here, we identified a gene cluster on the chromosome of
anns.postfix: , lexABC, encoding an RND family multidrug efflux pump that confers resistance to myxin and phenazine methosulfate (PMS) (Figure 1).

anns.prefix: We discovered that the expression of lexABC was promoted by myxin and positively regulated by a LysR-type transcriptional regulator, indicating that the LexABC pump could coordinate with myxin production to protect
anns.postfix: from autotoxicity.
